title: Minister Lamamra holds phone conversation with the U.S. Deputy Secretary of State
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, had a telephone conversation today with the U.S. Deputy Secretary of State, Ms. Wendy Sherman, on her initiative.

This meeting provided an opportunity to exchange views on several issues of common interest at both regional and international levels, including the situation in Mali and the Sahel-Saharan area, international cooperation in the fight against terrorism, the issues of Western Sahara and Palestine, as well as the current crisis in international relations on the back of the conflict in Ukraine.

The two officials who noted the promising prospects of Algerian-American relations, agreed to deepen the strategic dialogue at all levels between the two countries on the occasion of the next bilateral meetings.
